Republic of the Philippines    )
CITY OF CEBU                    )

 

 

PROJECT BASED EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

This employment agreement (the “Agreement”) is entered into and executed on _____________ at Cebu City, Philippines by and between the following:

 

HD Engineers+Builders, a construction firm duly organized and existing under and by the virtue of the laws of the Republic of the Philippines, with principal place of business at Rm 304 Albulario Building II, 37 Gen. Maxilom Avenue, Brgy. Kamputhaw, Cebu City 6000, Philippines, as represented herein by its Proprietor, Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet, hereinafter referred to as the “Employer”;

- and -

_________________, Filipino Citizen, of legal age, with address at _________________________, Philippines, hereinafter referred to as the “Employee”;

 

WITNESSETH

WHEREAS, the Employer is engaged in the business of construction services and is in need of ___________________ primarily for the purpose of _________________, in connection with this specific project/undertaking: _______________ to be completed after all deliverables have been made and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client;

WHEREAS, the Employee guarantees, declares, and warrants that the Employee has the necessary qualifications and is competent for the said position, as well as expressly acknowledges and consents to this casual employment arrangement;

WHEREAS, due to the above representations, the Employer offers the Employee the above-mentioned position as a project-based employee;

NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises, the parties hereby agree as follows:

1.    Employment Period – The employment commences on _______________ until project completion and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client, provided that the following pre-employment requirements have been accomplished and submitted prior to the 1st day of work: _____________________________. Unless otherwise directed, the ordinary working hours shall be from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., with a one-hour meal break. The ordinary workdays shall be from Monday to Saturday except as otherwise instructed.

2.    Compensation – The Employee’s gross compensation is Php _________.__ per month. After deductions, the net income shall be payable on the 15th and 30th of the month.

3.    Duties and Responsibilities – The Employee hereby consents to be assigned primarily the following duties and responsibilities: ______________________________, without being limited thereto. The Employer reserves the right to appoint the Employee to other tasks and responsibilities.

4.    Monetary Benefits and Leaves – Unless otherwise provided in the company policies, statutory monetary benefits and leaves will be provided to the Employee whenever due and proper.

5.    Violations and Disciplinary Actions – Except as otherwise modified in the company policies, labor law grounds for disciplinary action, including termination, is hereby adopted and incorporated by reference.

6.    Taxes, Government Contributions, Authority to Deduct – The Employee hereby agrees to deductions authorized by law, including but not limited to, withholding tax, SSS, Philhealth, Pag-IBIG, debts owing to the Employer, and all other analogous deductions.

7.    Company Policies – The Employee hereby agrees and consents to the terms and conditions stated in company policies, which are incorporated herein by reference and made an integral part hereof.

8.    Entirety of Agreement – The parties hereby agree that this Agreement and those which are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire employment contract and supersedes all prior arrangements, whether verbal or written. The parties expressly agree that this project-employment contract is separate, independent, and not connected to any other arrangement for previous projects, to which the Employee hereby declares that all monetary claims have been paid.

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this agreement on the above date.

 

 HD ENGINEERS+BUILDERS

 

 

 

 

By:

 

ENGR. HERBERT M. DIAPOLET

MR. <EMPLOYEE>

 

ACKNOWLEDGMENT

SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME, this _____ day of _______________, 2015, in the City of __________________________, personally appeared:

COMPLETE NAME

COMPETENT EVIDENCE OF IDENTITY

KATRINA SHANE S. ESMILLA

Driver’s License N03-123-456780

JIMMY MENDOZA

Driver’s License N05-321-456780

 

Known to be the same persons who executed the foregoing instrument, and acknowledged that the same are their free act and deed.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my notarial seal on the date and place above written.

Doc No. ___;
Page No. ___;                                                                    NOTARY PUBLIC
Book No. ___;
Series of   ___.

Republic of the Philippines    )
CITY OF CEBU                    )

 

PROJECT-BASED EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

 

This employment agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into and executed on {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"project_name":doc.project}, "expected_start_date") or "", "MMMM dd, yyyy") }} at Cebu City, Philippines by and between the following:

 

HD Engineers+Builders, a construction firm duly organized and existing under and by the virtue of the laws of the Republic of the Philippines, with principal place of business at Rm 304 Albulario Building II, 37 Gen. Maxilom Avenue, Brgy. Kamputhaw, Cebu City 6000, Philippines, as represented herein by its Proprietor, Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet, hereinafter referred to as the "Employer";

 

- and –

 

{{doc.employee_name}}, Filipino Citizen, of legal age, with address at {{doc.current_address}}, Philippines, hereinafter referred to as the "Employee";

 

 

WITNESSETH

 

WHEREAS, the Employer is engaged in the business of construction services and is in need of a {{doc.designation}} for the purpose of providing direct labor on site in connection with this specific project/undertaking: {{doc.project}} to be completed after all deliverables have been made and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client;

 

WHEREAS, the Employee guarantees, declares, and warrants that he has the necessary qualifications and is competent for the said position, as well as expressly acknowledges and consents to this employment arrangement;

 

WHEREAS, due to the above representations, the Employer offers the Employee the above-mentioned position as a project-based employee;

 

NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises, the parties hereby agree as follows:

 

1.      Employment Period – The employment commences on {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"project_name":doc.project}, "expected_start_date") or "", "MMMM dd, yyyy") }} until project completion and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client, provided that the following pre-employment requirements have been accomplished and submitted prior to the 1st day of work. Unless otherwise set by a special working schedule, the working hours shall be 7:00a.m. to 5:00p.m. from Mondays to Fridays and 7:00a.m. to 11:00a.m. on Saturdays.

 

2.      Compensation – The Employee’s gross compensation is Php {{ frappe.db.get_value("Employee Internal Work History", {"is_current":"yes"}, "daily_wage_rate") or ""}} per day. After deductions, the net income shall be payable every Saturday of the week.

 

3.    Duties and Responsibilities – The Employee hereby consents to be assigned primarily the duties and responsibilities defined in the Employee Handbook, without being limited thereto. The Employer reserves the right to appoint the Employee to other tasks and responsibilities.

 

4.    Employee Benefits – The approved Employee Handbook details the Employee Benefits (Compensation and Benefits). The project employee is entitled to the benefits appurtenant to project employees only.

 

5.    Code of Employee Discipline – The Code of Conduct found in the Employee Handbook, governs the actuations, behavior, and performances of the project employee.

 

6.    Taxes, Government Contributions, Authority to Deduct – The Employee hereby agrees to deductions authorized by law, including but not limited to, withholding tax, SSS, Philhealth, Pag-IBIG, debts owing to the Employer, and all other analogous deductions.

 

7.    Company Policies – The Employee hereby agrees and consents to the terms and conditions stated in company policies, which are incorporated herein by the Employee Handbook and made an integral part hereof.

 

8.    Entirety of Agreement – The parties hereby agree that this Agreement and those which are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire employment contract and supersedes all prior arrangements, whether verbal or written. The parties expressly agree that this project-employment contract is separate, independent, and not connected to any other arrangement for previous projects, to which the Employee hereby declares that all monetary claims have been paid.

 

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this agreement on the above date.

 

 

            HD ENGINEERS+BUILDERS

 

 

 

 

By:

 

Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet

Proprietor

Republic of the Philippines    )
CITY OF CEBU                    )

 

 

PROJECT BASED EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

This employment agreement (the “Agreement”) is entered into and executed on _____________ at Cebu City, Philippines by and between the following:

 

HD Engineers+Builders, a construction firm duly organized and existing under and by the virtue of the laws of the Republic of the Philippines, with principal place of business at Rm 304 Albulario Building II, 37 Gen. Maxilom Avenue, Brgy. Kamputhaw, Cebu City 6000, Philippines, as represented herein by its Proprietor, Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet, hereinafter referred to as the “Employer”;

- and -

_________________, Filipino Citizen, of legal age, with address at _________________________, Philippines, hereinafter referred to as the “Employee”;

 

WITNESSETH

WHEREAS, the Employer is engaged in the business of construction services and is in need of ___________________ primarily for the purpose of _________________, in connection with this specific project/undertaking: _______________ to be completed after all deliverables have been made and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client;

WHEREAS, the Employee guarantees, declares, and warrants that the Employee has the necessary qualifications and is competent for the said position, as well as expressly acknowledges and consents to this casual employment arrangement;

WHEREAS, due to the above representations, the Employer offers the Employee the above-mentioned position as a project-based employee;

NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises, the parties hereby agree as follows:

1.    Employment Period – The employment commences on _______________ until project completion and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client, provided that the following pre-employment requirements have been accomplished and submitted prior to the 1st day of work: _____________________________. Unless otherwise directed, the ordinary working hours shall be from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., with a one-hour meal break. The ordinary workdays shall be from Monday to Saturday except as otherwise instructed.

2.    Compensation – The Employee’s gross compensation is Php _________.__ per month. After deductions, the net income shall be payable on the 15th and 30th of the month.

3.    Duties and Responsibilities – The Employee hereby consents to be assigned primarily the following duties and responsibilities: ______________________________, without being limited thereto. The Employer reserves the right to appoint the Employee to other tasks and responsibilities.

4.    Monetary Benefits and Leaves – Unless otherwise provided in the company policies, statutory monetary benefits and leaves will be provided to the Employee whenever due and proper.

5.    Violations and Disciplinary Actions – Except as otherwise modified in the company policies, labor law grounds for disciplinary action, including termination, is hereby adopted and incorporated by reference.

6.    Taxes, Government Contributions, Authority to Deduct – The Employee hereby agrees to deductions authorized by law, including but not limited to, withholding tax, SSS, Philhealth, Pag-IBIG, debts owing to the Employer, and all other analogous deductions.

7.    Company Policies – The Employee hereby agrees and consents to the terms and conditions stated in company policies, which are incorporated herein by reference and made an integral part hereof.

8.    Entirety of Agreement – The parties hereby agree that this Agreement and those which are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire employment contract and supersedes all prior arrangements, whether verbal or written. The parties expressly agree that this project-employment contract is separate, independent, and not connected to any other arrangement for previous projects, to which the Employee hereby declares that all monetary claims have been paid.

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this agreement on the above date.

 

 HD ENGINEERS+BUILDERS

 

 

 

 

By:

 

ENGR. HERBERT M. DIAPOLET

MR. <EMPLOYEE>

 

ACKNOWLEDGMENT

SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME, this _____ day of _______________, 2015, in the City of __________________________, personally appeared:

COMPLETE NAME

COMPETENT EVIDENCE OF IDENTITY

KATRINA SHANE S. ESMILLA

Driver’s License N03-123-456780

JIMMY MENDOZA

Driver’s License N05-321-456780

 

Known to be the same persons who executed the foregoing instrument, and acknowledged that the same are their free act and deed.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my notarial seal on the date and place above written.

Doc No. ___;

Book No. ___;
Series of   ___.

Republic of the Philippines    )
CITY OF CEBU                         )

 

PROJECT-BASED EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

 

This employment agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into and executed on ______________________________ at Cebu City, Philippines by and between the following:

 

{{doc.company}}, a construction firm duly organized and existing under and by the virtue of the laws of the Republic of the Philippines, with principal place of business at Rm 304 Albulario Building II, 37 Gen. Maxilom Avenue, Brgy. Kamputhaw, Cebu City 6000, Philippines, as represented herein by its General Manager, Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet, hereinafter referred to as the "Employer";

- and –

{{doc.employee_name}}, Filipino Citizen, of legal age, with address at {{doc.current_address}}, Philippines, hereinafter referred to as the "Employee";

 

WITNESSETH

 

WHEREAS, the Employer is engaged in the business of construction services and is in need of a {{doc.designation}} for the purpose of providing direct labor on site in connection with the following specific project/undertaking to be completed after all deliverables have been made and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client:

Project Name: {{doc.project}}

Full Contract Name: {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"name":doc.project}, "contract_name") or "" }}

Project Duration:       {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"name":doc.project}, "project_duration") or ""}} calendar days

 

WHEREAS, the Employee guarantees, declares, and warrants that he has the necessary qualifications and is competent for the said position, as well as expressly acknowledges and consents to this employment arrangement;

 

WHEREAS, due to the above representations, the Employer offers the Employee the above-mentioned position as a project-based employee;

 

NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises, the parties hereby agree as follows:

 

1.    Employment Period – The employment commences on {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"project_name":doc.project}, "expected_start_date") or "", "MMMM dd, yyyy") }} until project completion and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client, provided that the following pre-employment requirements have been accomplished and submitted prior to the 1st day of work. Unless otherwise set by a special working schedule, the working hours shall be 7:00a.m. to 5:00p.m. from Mondays to Fridays and 7:00a.m. to 11:00a.m. on Saturdays.

2.    Compensation – The Employee’s gross compensation is Php {{frappe.format ( frappe.db.get_value("Salary Structure Assignment", {"employee":doc.name}, "base" or "") ,'Currency') }} per day. After deductions, the net income shall be payable every designated day of the week after the established cut-off period that is defined in the company policy.

3.    Duties and Responsibilities – The Employee hereby consents to be assigned primarily the duties and responsibilities defined in the Employee Handbook, without being limited thereto. The Employer reserves the right to appoint the Employee to other tasks and responsibilities.

4.    Employee Benefits – The approved Employee Handbook details the Employee Benefits (Compensation and Benefits). The project employee is entitled to the benefits appurtenant to project employees only.

5.    Code of Employee Discipline – The Code of Conduct found in the Employee Handbook, governs the actuations, behavior, and performances of the project employee.

6.    Authority to Deduct – The Employee hereby agrees to deductions authorized by law, including but not limited to, withholding tax, SSS, Philhealth, Pag-IBIG, debts owing to the Employer, and all other analogous deductions.

7.    Company Policies – The Employee hereby agrees and consents to the terms and conditions stated in company policies, which are incorporated herein by the Employee Handbook and made an integral part hereof.

8.    Entirety of Agreement – The parties hereby agree that this Agreement and those which are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire employment contract and supersedes all prior arrangements, whether verbal or written. The parties expressly agree that this project-employment contract is separate, independent, and not connected to any other arrangement for previous projects, to which the Employee hereby declares that all monetary claims have been paid.

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this agreement on the above date.

 

{{doc.company}}

 

By:

 

HERBERT M. DIAPOLET

General Manager

{{doc.get_formatted("employee_name")}}

Project Employee

 

WITNESS:             _______________________________                        ____________________________

ACKNOWLEDGMENT

 

SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME, this _____ day of _______________, ______, in the City of Cebu, Philippines personally appeared:

 

Complete Name

Competent Evidence of Identity

Herbert M. Diapolet

TIN 426-651-349

{{doc.employee_name}}

TIN {{doc.tin or ""}}

 

Known to be the same persons who executed the foregoing instrument, and acknowledged that the same are their free act and deed.

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my notarial seal on the date and place above written.

{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}

I hereby pledge to pay the above loan on its scheduled date and allows my employer to deduct the repayment amount from my wages.

In case my co-maker resigns, I will be resposible to find another co-maker within 24 hours after he/she tendered his/her resignation, otherwise, my outstanding loan balance is due and demandable.

"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Ako nagasaad nga bayaran ko kini nga maong utang sumala sa nasabutan nga mga petsa sa pagbayad ug nagtugot ako nga kuhaan ang akong sweldo para niini nga bayad.

Kung ang akong co-maker mag-resign, ako maoy responsable sa pagpangita og laing co-maker sulod sa 24 oras diin siya mi-resign. Kung dili ako makapangita og laing co-maker, mamahimong due og suktononon na ang nabilin nga balanse sa utang.




.........................................
{{doc.applicant_name}}

.........................................
Date Signed"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Co-Maker's Oath"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% if doc.co_maker %}

I agree to be the co-maker of the borrower, {{doc.applicant_name}}, without any hesitation nor constraints, whatsoever, and guarantee the loan he/she is availing.

In case the borrower resigns from the company, I shall pay the borrower’s outstanding obligation once he/she fails to pay his/her financial obligation from the company when all collection efforts have failed.

With this, I hereby authorize the company, {{doc.company}} to deduct from my salary/wages every payroll until the outstanding loan of the resigned borrower is fully paid.

{% else %} Not Applicable {% endif %}"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% if doc.co_maker %}

Ako nagtugot nga walay pagduha-duha nga mamahimong co-maker sa nangutang nga si {{doc.applicant_name}} og nag-garantiya sa loan nga iyang gitinguha.

Kung ang nangutang mo resign sa kompanya og aduna pa siyay mga obligasyon o loan balance nga wala na mabayari bisan pa sa pakigbisog sa kompanya sa pagkolekta, ako maoy mubayad sa maong obligasyon o loan balance

Busa, ako nagtugot sa kompanya, {{doc.company}} nga mag-deduct o magkuha gikan sa akong sweldo sa loan balance kada payroll hangtud nga mabayaran ang tibuok nga utang.




.........................................
{{doc.co_maker_name}}
Co-Maker

.........................................
Date Signed {% else %} Not Applicable {% endif %}"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Approval"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Approved by:

Herbert M. Diapolet
General Manager"}]

Dear BAC Members:

 

We found the opportunity listing for the proposed project listed above through PhilGEPS. Our firm, {{doc.company}} is pleased to submit herewith our interest to participate in the public bidding for this project. As the company's Authorized Managing Officer, I hereby authorize {{doc.authorized_representative}} to attend the Pre-bidding Conference and Bid Opening, pay the bidding documents, and sign documents, on behalf of the company in relation to the procurement activities of this project.

 

We shall be glad to provide our eligibility documents on your scheduled deadline of submissions.

 

Thank you and more power!

 

Respectfully yours,

 

 

Herbert M. Diapolet, MECE

Dear {{doc.employee_name}},

 

Greetings!

 

In recognition of your outstanding performance, I would like to congratulate you for your promotion details below starting {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.promotion_date, "MMMM dd, yyyy") }}. 

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Employee Promotion Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "promotion_details", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee Promotion Detail", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "property", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "current", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "new", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "other_details", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Other Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

For this position, the salary/wage will be ₱ {{frappe.format (frappe.db.get_value("Salary Structure Assignment", {"employee":doc.employee}, "base" or "") ,'Currency') }} per day subject to statutory deductions. We have attached a separate Salary Increase letter to formalize this change. Listed below are your new job responsibilities:

 

General Description:

{{frappe.db.get_value("Designation", {"designation_name":doc.designation}, "description" or "" ) }} 

Specific Duties:

{{frappe.db.get_value("Designation", {"designation_name":doc.designation}, "job_description" or "" ) }} 

We hope that you continue your commitment to the job  and inspire you to reach still higher goals in your career. Congratulations again and good luck!

 

If you have any inquiries regarding the salary or coverage, please contact hr@HDengineers.com.ph or call (032) 417 2664.

 

Regards,

 

Herbert M. Diapolet, MECE
General Manager

"}]

<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:"Cambria Math";
	panose-1:2 4 5 3 5 4 6 3 2 4;}
@font-face
	{font-family:"Roboto Condensed";
	panose-1:2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0;}
 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:107%;
	font-size:11.0pt;
 	text-align:justify;
	font-family:"Roboto Condensed";}
span.Heading1Char
	{mso-style-name:"Heading 1 Char";
	mso-style-link:"Heading 1";
	font-family:Roboto;
	color:#A5A5A5;}
.MsoPapDefault
	{margin-bottom:8.0pt;
	line-height:107%;}
@page WordSection1
	{size: 8.5in 13.0in;
	margin: 0.75in 0.75in 0.75in 0.75in;}
div.WordSection1
	{page:WordSection1;}
	
	
.print-format td, .print-format th {
    padding: 2px !important;
}

@page {
    margin-top: 0.75in;
    margin-bottom: 0.75in;
    margin-left: 0.75in;
    margin-right: 0.75in;    
}
html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Doc. Ref.: {{doc.name }}
Advance Payment Request

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get_formatted('posting_date'), "MMMM dd, yyyy") }}

 

{%if frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "suffix")%} {% else %} {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "salutation") or "Mr/Ms"}} {% endif %} {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "first_name") or ""}} {% if frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "middle_name") %} {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "middle_name")[:1]}}. {% endif %} {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "last_name") or ""}} {%-if frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "suffix")-%}, {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "suffix")}} {% endif %}
{{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "designation") or ""}}
{% if doc.customer %}{{doc.customer}}
{% endif %} {% if doc.lead%}{{doc.lead}}
{% endif %} {% if doc.supplier%}{{doc.supplier}}
{% endif %} {% if frappe.db.get_value("Contact", "Customer:[doc.name]", "phone") %} Tel No. {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", "Customer:[doc.name]", "phone")}}
{% endif %} {% if frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "mobile_no") %}Mobile No. {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "mobile_no")}}
{% endif %} {% if frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "email_id") %}Email {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "email_id")}}
{% endif %} {% if doc.address_display %}{{doc.address_display}}{% endif %}

 

Project:     {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "contract_name") or ""}}

Subject:    REQUEST FOR ADVANCE PAYMENT

Dear {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "salutation" ) or "Mr/Mrs"}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "last_name") or "________________"}}:

Greetings!

Please allow this letter to serve as our request to receive an advance payment from the {{doc.customer}} for the contract {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "contract_id") or "" }} {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "contract_name") or "" }} located at {{frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "project_location_display").replace("\n", " ").replace("
", ", ") or ""}}.

We hereby request a 15% advance payment as permitted by Annex E.4 of the 2016 Revised IRR of RA 9184, otherwise known as the Government Procurement Reform Act. The breakdown is as follows:

Contract Price   

{{frappe.format (frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "hd_bid_price") or "", 'Currency' )}}

Advance Payment  (15%)

{{doc.get_formatted("grand_total")}}

Amount in Words

{{doc.in_words}}

 

Please note that the costs incurred and paid from the advance payment will be accounted for in the subsequent progress billings.

We hope you find the above in order and thank you for giving us the opportunity to work with you on this project.

 

Yours faithfully,

 

HERBERT M. DIAPOLET, MECE
Project Manager
name: Advance Payment Request

html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Doc. Ref.: {{doc.name }}
Advance Payment Request

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get_formatted('posting_date'), "MMMM dd, yyyy") }}

 

{{doc.contact_person or ""}}
{{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "designation") or ""}}
{% if doc.customer %}{{doc.customer}}
{% endif %} {% if doc.contact_mobile %}{{doc.contact_mobile}}
{% endif %} {% if doc.contact_email %}{{doc.contact_email}}
{% endif %} {% if doc.address_display %}{{doc.address_display}}{% endif %}

 

Project:     {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "contract_name") or ""}}

Subject:    REQUEST FOR ADVANCE PAYMENT

Dear {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "salutation" or "Mr/Mrs") }} {{frappe.db.get_value("Contact", doc.contact_person, "last_name") or "________________"}}:

Greetings!

Please allow this letter to serve as our request to receive an advance payment from the {{doc.customer}} for the contract {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "contract_id") or "" }} {{frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "contract_name") or "" }} located at {{frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "project_location_display").replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") or ""}}.

We are hereby requesting for an advance payment, as indicated in our agreed terms and conditions. The breakdown is as follows:

Contract Price   

{{frappe.format (frappe.db.get_value("Project", doc.project, "hd_bid_price") or "", 'Currency' )}}

Advance Payment

{{doc.get_formatted("grand_total")}}

Amount in Words

{{doc.in_words}}

 

Please note that the costs incurred and paid from the advance payment will be accounted for in the subsequent progress billings or in the final billing, whichever is agreed.

We hope you find the above in order and thank you for giving us the opportunity to work with you on this project.

 

Yours faithfully,

 

HERBERT M. DIAPOLET, MECE
Project Manager
name: Advance Payment Request - Private

We found the opportunity for your proposed project through {{doc.source}}. Our firm, {{doc.company}} is pleased to submit herewith our interest to participate in the bidding for this project. As the company's Authorized Managing Officer, I also authorize {{doc.authorized_representative}} to attend any Pre-bidding Conference and Bid Opening,on behalf of the company in relation to the procurement activities of this project.

 

We shall be glad to provide our eligibility documents on your scheduled deadline of submissions.

 

Thank you and more power!

 

Respectfully yours,

 

 

Herbert M. Diapolet, MECE
General Manager

Dear Employee,


SALARY INCREASE


I am pleased to inform you that effective {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get_formatted('from_date'), "MMMM dd, yyyy") }} , the new wage rate for your {{frappe.db.get_value("Employee", {"employee":doc.employee}, "employment_type")}} employment with us, will be Php {{doc.get_formatted('base')}} {{doc.base_frequency}} from your current Php {{doc.get_formatted('previous_wage_rate')}} {{doc.previous_wage_rate_period}} subject to applicable statutory deductions detailed below.


{% if doc.remarks %}

Please take note of the following conditions associated with this salary increase.

{{doc.remarks}}


{% endif %}

This is a well-deserved salary increase and we thank you for your hardwork and dedication towards the company's achievements.


Congratulations!


Yours truly,


Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet

{{ doc.name }}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldname": "_custom_html", "options": "

Republic of the Philippines    )
CITY OF CEBU                    )

 

 

PROJECT BASED EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

This employment agreement (the “Agreement”) is entered into and executed on _____________ at Cebu City, Philippines by and between the following:

 

HD Engineers+Builders, a construction firm duly organized and existing under and by the virtue of the laws of the Republic of the Philippines, with principal place of business at Rm 304 Albulario Building II, 37 Gen. Maxilom Avenue, Brgy. Kamputhaw, Cebu City 6000, Philippines, as represented herein by its Proprietor, Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet, hereinafter referred to as the “Employer”;

- and -

_________________, Filipino Citizen, of legal age, with address at _________________________, Philippines, hereinafter referred to as the “Employee”;

 

WITNESSETH

WHEREAS, the Employer is engaged in the business of construction services and is in need of ___________________ primarily for the purpose of _________________, in connection with this specific project/undertaking: _______________ to be completed after all deliverables have been made and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client;

WHEREAS, the Employee guarantees, declares, and warrants that the Employee has the necessary qualifications and is competent for the said position, as well as expressly acknowledges and consents to this casual employment arrangement;

WHEREAS, due to the above representations, the Employer offers the Employee the above-mentioned position as a project-based employee;

NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises, the parties hereby agree as follows:

1.    Employment Period – The employment commences on _______________ until project completion and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client, provided that the following pre-employment requirements have been accomplished and submitted prior to the 1st day of work: _____________________________. Unless otherwise directed, the ordinary working hours shall be from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., with a one-hour meal break. The ordinary workdays shall be from Monday to Saturday except as otherwise instructed.

2.    Compensation – The Employee’s gross compensation is Php _________.__ per month. After deductions, the net income shall be payable on the 15th and 30th of the month.

3.    Duties and Responsibilities – The Employee hereby consents to be assigned primarily the following duties and responsibilities: ______________________________, without being limited thereto. The Employer reserves the right to appoint the Employee to other tasks and responsibilities.

4.    Monetary Benefits and Leaves – Unless otherwise provided in the company policies, statutory monetary benefits and leaves will be provided to the Employee whenever due and proper.

5.    Violations and Disciplinary Actions – Except as otherwise modified in the company policies, labor law grounds for disciplinary action, including termination, is hereby adopted and incorporated by reference.

6.    Taxes, Government Contributions, Authority to Deduct – The Employee hereby agrees to deductions authorized by law, including but not limited to, withholding tax, SSS, Philhealth, Pag-IBIG, debts owing to the Employer, and all other analogous deductions.

7.    Company Policies – The Employee hereby agrees and consents to the terms and conditions stated in company policies, which are incorporated herein by reference and made an integral part hereof.

8.    Entirety of Agreement – The parties hereby agree that this Agreement and those which are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire employment contract and supersedes all prior arrangements, whether verbal or written. The parties expressly agree that this project-employment contract is separate, independent, and not connected to any other arrangement for previous projects, to which the Employee hereby declares that all monetary claims have been paid.

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this agreement on the above date.

 

 HD ENGINEERS+BUILDERS

 

 

 

 

By:

 

ENGR. HERBERT M. DIAPOLET

MR. <EMPLOYEE>

html:
Republic of the Philippines    )
CITY OF CEBU                    )

 

PROJECT-BASED EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT

 

This employment agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into and executed on {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"project_name":doc.project}, "expected_start_date") or "", "MMMM dd, yyyy") }} at Cebu City, Philippines by and between the following:

 

HD Engineers+Builders, a construction firm duly organized and existing under and by the virtue of the laws of the Republic of the Philippines, with principal place of business at Rm 304 Albulario Building II, 37 Gen. Maxilom Avenue, Brgy. Kamputhaw, Cebu City 6000, Philippines, as represented herein by its Proprietor, Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet, hereinafter referred to as the "Employer";

 

- and –

 

{{doc.employee_name}}, Filipino Citizen, of legal age, with address at {{doc.current_address}}, Philippines, hereinafter referred to as the "Employee";

 

 

WITNESSETH

 

WHEREAS, the Employer is engaged in the business of construction services and is in need of a {{doc.designation}} for the purpose of providing direct labor on site in connection with this specific project/undertaking: {{doc.project}} to be completed after all deliverables have been made and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client;

 

WHEREAS, the Employee guarantees, declares, and warrants that he has the necessary qualifications and is competent for the said position, as well as expressly acknowledges and consents to this employment arrangement;

 

WHEREAS, due to the above representations, the Employer offers the Employee the above-mentioned position as a project-based employee;

 

NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises, the parties hereby agree as follows:

 

1.      Employment Period – The employment commences on {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Project", {"project_name":doc.project}, "expected_start_date") or "", "MMMM dd, yyyy") }} until project completion and/or otherwise pre-terminated by the client, provided that the following pre-employment requirements have been accomplished and submitted prior to the 1st day of work. Unless otherwise directed, the ordinary working hours shall be from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., with a one-hour meal break. The ordinary workdays shall be from Monday to Saturday except as otherwise instructed.

 

2.      Compensation – The Employee’s gross compensation is Php {{ frappe.db.get_value("Employee Internal Work History", {"is_current":"yes"}, "daily_wage_rate") or ""}} per day. After deductions, the net income shall be payable every Saturday of the week.

 

3.    Duties and Responsibilities – The Employee hereby consents to be assigned primarily the duties and responsibilities defined in Annex A – Employee Handbook, without being limited thereto. The Employer reserves the right to appoint the Employee to other tasks and responsibilities.

 

4.    Employee Benefits – Attached hereto as Annex A is the Employee Handbook. The project employee is entitled to the benefits appurtenant to project employees only. He is not entitled to the benefits that are clearly designated as "FOR REGULAR AND PERMANENT EMPLOYEES ONLY."

 

5.    Code of Employee Discipline – The Code of Employee Discipline found in Annex A – Employee Handbook, governs the actuations, behavior, and performances of the project employee.

 

6.    Taxes, Government Contributions, Authority to Deduct – The Employee hereby agrees to deductions authorized by law, including but not limited to, withholding tax, SSS, Philhealth, Pag-IBIG, debts owing to the Employer, and all other analogous deductions.

 

7.    Company Policies – The Employee hereby agrees and consents to the terms and conditions stated in company policies, which are incorporated herein by Annex A and made an integral part hereof.

 

8.    Entirety of Agreement – The parties hereby agree that this Agreement and those which are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire employment contract and supersedes all prior arrangements, whether verbal or written. The parties expressly agree that this project-employment contract is separate, independent, and not connected to any other arrangement for previous projects, to which the Employee hereby declares that all monetary claims have been paid.

 

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this agreement on the above date.

 

 

            HD ENGINEERS+BUILDERS

 

 

 

 

By:

 

Engr. Herbert M. Diapolet

Proprietor

{{doc.get_formatted("salutation")}} {{doc.get_formatted("employee_name")}}

Project Employee

 

WITNESS:

 

_______________________________                  ____________________________

 

ACKNOWLEDGMENT

 

SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME, this _____ day of _______________, ______, in the City of Cebu, Philippines personally appeared:

 

Complete Name

Competent Evidence of Identity

Herbert M. Diapolet

TIN 426-651-349

{{doc.employee_name}}

 

 

Known to be the same persons who executed the foregoing instrument, and acknowledged that the same are their free act and deed.

 

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my notarial seal on the date and place above written.

Usa ka taho sa insidente nga naa niini nga sulat ang gisang-at sa HCDC Portal nga naay Incident Report No. {{doc.name}} niadtong {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.creation, 'MMMM dd, YYYY') }} kalabot sa {{doc.grievance_type}}, nga adunay pangahulugan sumala sa Employee Handbook:

{{frappe.db.get_value("Grievance Type", doc.grievance_type, "description_visayan") }}

Palihug ipasabot pinaagi sa pagsulat sulod sa pito (7) ka adlaw sa kalendaryo sukad sa pagkadawat niini, ang imong bahin og eksplanasyon niini nga butang ug nganong dili ka angay ipailalom sa tukma nga aksyong pagdisiplina kalabot sa nahisgotang mga buhat o sayop nga binuhatan. Ang pagkapakyas sa pagtubag sulod sa gihatag nga panahon himoon isip usa ka pagbiya sa imong katungod nga madungog.

Ang imong pagsunod hugot nga awhag.


Truly yours,


Alexan T. Casas
HR Officer

Kini matiungod sa Incident Report No. {{doc.name}} niadtong {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.creation, 'MMMM dd, YYYY') }} kalabot sa {{doc.grievance_type}}.

Ang mga detalye sa insidente, mao kini:

{{doc.description}}

{% if doc.cause_of_grievance %}

Sa gihimo nga imbestigasyon, ang mga hinungdan sa mga panghitabo, mao kini:

{{doc.cause_of_grievance}}

{% endif %}

Busa, niabot og desisyon ang kompanya ani nga resolusyon:

{{doc.resolution_detail}}

Kini nga sulat gihimo para ipaabot ang silot nga suspenso sa imong trabaho sugod {{doc.employee_suspension_start_date}} hangtud {{doc.employee_suspension_end_date}} ug pag-abiso sa dili na pag-usab niining panghitabo.

Alang sa imong hugot nga pag-tuman.


Truly yours,


April Gin U. Ylaya
HR Officer


Approved:


Herbert M. Diapolet, MECE
General Manager

This is in relation to Incident Report No. {{doc.name}} dated {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.creation, 'MMMM dd, YYYY') }} about the subject, {{doc.grievance_type}}.

{{doc.description}}

{% if doc.cause_of_grievance %}

For your strict compliance.

April Gin U. Ylaya

"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{%if "Retention" in doc.billing_no %}

Greetings!

Please allow this letter to serve as our request to receive payment for the retention money from the {{doc.customer}}, for the above-mentioned contract.

The said retention money shall be substituted by our company with a surety bond (Retention Money Bond attached), posted in favor of your company/agency and is valid one (1) year from the completion of the project. This is in compliance with {% if frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "customer_group") in "Private - Commercial, Private - Individual, Private - Non Profit" %} our agreed terms and conditions. {% else %} Annex “E” Sec. 6.2 of the Revised IRR of RA 9184, to wit:

"The total "retention money" shall be due for release upon final acceptance of the works. The contractor may, however, request the substitution of the retention money for each progress billing with irrevocable standby letters of credit of from a commercial bank, bank guarantees or surety bonds callable on demand, of amounts equivalent to the retention money substituted for and acceptable to Government..."
{% endif %}

We hereby request the payment of the substituted retention money, in the amount detailed below as withheld in the attached Certificate of Payment/Disbursement Voucher.

{% else %}

This is not a valid document. Indicate "Retention" in the Billing No.

{% endif %}"}, {"fieldname": "grand_total", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "Accumulated Retention"}, {"fieldname": "in_words", "print_hide": 0, "label": "In Words"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

We hope you find the above in order and thank you for giving us the opportunity to work with you in this project.

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Yours faithfully,


HERBERT M. DIAPOLET, MECE
General Manager

"}]
name: Retention Release

{{doc.resolution_detail}}

Sa mga resolusyon nga adunay mga silot og mga penalties, aduna ikaw tsansa nga makatubag ani nga sulat sulod sa tulo (3) ka adlaw, pinaagi sa paghatag sa imong sulat nga paghangyo o pagsupak niining desisyon. Kon dili, isipon kining desisyon nga pinal nga ipatuman.

Alang sa imong hugot nga pag-tuman.


Truly yours,


Alexan T. Casas

Herbert M. Diapolet, MECE

Dear {{frappe.db.get_value( "Contact", doc.contact_person, "salutation" or "Mr/Mrs") }} {{frappe.db.get_value( "Contact", doc.contact_person, "last_name") or "________________"}}:


Greetings!


Please allow this letter to serve as our request for payment from the {{doc.customer_name}} in the amount detailed below, for the contract {{frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "contract_name") }}.

Our current accomplishment to date is at {{doc.accomplishment_to_date_percent}}% for this project. The accompanying Statement of Work Accomplished (SWA) can provide more details of our accomplishments per item, for your reference. To summarize:


"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Original Contract Amount {% set original_sales_order = frappe.get_all('Sales Order', filters={'project': doc.project, 'docstatus': 1, 'order_type':"Sales"}, fields=['sum(grand_total) as total']) %} {{ frappe.format (original_sales_order[0].total or 0, "Currency" ) }}
       Add: Variation Orders {% set total_variation = frappe.get_all('Sales Order', filters={'project': doc.project, 'docstatus': 1, 'order_type':"Variation"}, fields=['sum(grand_total) as total']) %} {{ frappe.format (total_variation[0].total or 0, "Currency" ) }}
Revised Contract Amount {% set total_sales_orders = frappe.get_all('Sales Order', filters={'project': doc.project, 'docstatus': 1}, fields=['sum(grand_total) as total']) %} {{ frappe.format (total_sales_orders[0].total or 0, "Currency" ) }}
Accomplishment to Date:                                                {{doc.accomplishment_to_date_percent}}% of Contract Amount {{frappe.format (doc.accomplishment_to_date_amt, 'Currency' )}}
       Less: Previous Accumulated Accomplishment:                    {{doc.accumulated_previous_accomplishment_percent}}% {{frappe.format (doc.accumulated_previous_accomplishment_amount, 'Currency' )}}
Accomplishment at Present:                                         {{doc.current_accomplishment_percent}}% of Contract Amount {{frappe.format (doc.current_accomplishment_amount, 'Currency' )}}

Gross Amount Due

{{doc.get_formatted("grand_total")}}
Subject to applicable withholding taxes and/or other agreed recoupments.
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

We hope you find the above in order and thank you for giving us the opportunity to work with you in this project.


"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Yours faithfully,


Herbert M. Diapolet, MECE
General Manager

"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}]

format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Authorization"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

RECEIPT, RELEASE AND QUITCLAIM

"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

For and in consideration of the amount of {{ doc.total_in_words }} Philippine Pesos ({{ frappe.format (doc.rounded_total, "Currency" )}}), received in CASH, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, being in full and complete satisfaction of all claims I may have or may arise by virtue of my employment with {{doc.company}}, I, {{doc.employee_name}} (Employee No. {{doc.employee}}), of legal age, residing at {{ frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.employee, "current_address") or "___________________________"}}, and with permanent address at {{ frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.employee, "permanent_address") or "___________________________"}}, do hereby forever release, remise, and discharge, and by these presents, for myself, my representatives, agents, assigns, heirs, executors, and administrators, remise, release, and forever discharge {{doc.company}} , their subsidiaries, successors, assigns, and trustees, as well as their directors, officers, stockholders, employees, agents, and representatives, from any manner of action or actions, cause or causes of action, sums of money, accounts, damages, claims, and demands whatsoever, in law or in equity, to which I may be entitled under the law, and which I ever had, now have, or hereafter may have, or which my representatives, agents, assigns, heirs, executors, and administrators can, shall, or may have, upon and by reason of my employment with {{doc.company}} , or upon any cause whatsoever, in relation or connection to my employment with {{doc.company}}.

I warrant and represent that I will withdraw any pending case, if any, and I shall not institute and hereby forever waive all and any kind of action, whether legal, administrative, or of any other nature and kind whatsoever, which I had, now have, or hereafter may have against {{doc.company}}, their stockholders, officers, directors, trustees, agents, or employees, arising out of, in connection with, related to, incidental to, or as a result of my employment in {{doc.company}}.

Finally, I hereby undertake in perpetuity to keep entirely confidential and to withhold from any party any information I have received or may have access to concerning {{doc.company}}.

I confirm that I have read and understood the contents of this Receipt, Release, and Quitclaim, which has been translated to Visayan dialect and that I voluntarily signed the same willingly, with full knowledge and understanding of my rights under existing laws.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand this _________ day of _______, 20______, at _______________________, Philippines.

"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

For and in consideration of the amount of {{ doc.total_in_words }} Philippine Pesos ({{ frappe.format (doc.rounded_total, "Currency" )}}), received in CASH, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, being in full and complete satisfaction of all claims I may have or may arise by virtue of my employment with {{doc.company}}, I, {{doc.employee_name}} (Employee No. {{doc.employee}}), of legal age, residing at {{ frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.employee, "current_address") or "___________________________"}}, and with permanent address at {{ frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.employee, "permanent_address") or "___________________________"}}, do hereby forever release, remise, and discharge, and by these presents, for myself, my representatives, agents, assigns, heirs, executors, and administrators, remise, release, and forever discharge {{doc.company}} , their subsidiaries, successors, assigns, and trustees, as well as their directors, officers, stockholders, employees, agents, and representatives, from any manner of action or actions, cause or causes of action, sums of money, accounts, damages, claims, and demands whatsoever, in law or in equity, to which I may be entitled under the law, and which I ever had, now have, or hereafter may have, or which my representatives, agents, assigns, heirs, executors, and administrators can, shall, or may have, upon and by reason of my employment with {{doc.company}}, or upon any cause whatsoever, in relation or connection to my employment with {{doc.company}}.

I warrant and represent that I will withdraw any pending case, if any, and I shall not institute and hereby forever waive all and any kind of action, whether legal, administrative, or of any other nature and kind whatsoever, which I had, now have, or hereafter may have against {{doc.company}}, their stockholders, officers, directors, trustees, agents, or employees, arising out of, in connection with, related to, incidental to, or as a result of my employment in {{doc.company}}.

Finally, I hereby undertake in perpetuity to keep entirely confidential and to withhold from any party any information I have received or may have access to concerning {{doc.company}}.

I confirm that I have read and understood the contents of this Receipt, Release, and Quitclaim, which has been translated to Visayan dialect and that I voluntarily signed the same willingly, with full knowledge and understanding of my rights under existing laws.
